Title: Prohibits the New York state department of taxation and finance from charging a fee for applications for a certificate of registration pursuant to a re-registration program
Summary: Prohibits the New York state department of taxation and finance from charging a fee for applications for a certificate of registration pursuant to a re-registration program.
LawCode: Amd Part LL-1 ยง1, Chap 57 of 2008; amd ยง1134, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend section 1 of part LL-1 of chapter 57 of the laws of 2008, relating to directing the commissioner of taxation and finance to institute a re-registration program, in relation to prohibiting the New York state department of taxation and finance from charging a vendor re-registration fee; to authorize the refund of all re-registration fees collected by the New York state department of taxation and finance; and to amend the tax law, in relation to prohibiting the New York state department of taxation and finance from charging vendors any fees to collect NYS sales tax
